body_html: Eh, I'm running out of tricks. Maybe there's sth wrong with the compiler? you can see that there's a -lcudnn flag when building _C.so. Try prepending LDFLAGS="-Wl,--no-as-needed" before the build command
body_text: Eh, I'm running out of tricks. Maybe there's sth wrong with the compiler? you can see that there's a -lcudnn flag when building _C.so.  Try prepending LDFLAGS="-Wl,--no-as-needed" before the build command
body: Eh, I'm running out of tricks. Maybe there's sth wrong with the compiler? you can see that there's a `-lcudnn` flag when building `_C.so`.  Try prepending `LDFLAGS="-Wl,--no-as-needed"` before the build command
